name: Ha Giang - the beauty of high land in Autumn - 26th, Sep, 2014
description:
Dong Van Karst Plateau Global Geo park in Ha Giang Province has many gigantic beautiful sceneries, special beautiful sites, diverse and endemic geological system, various groups of valuable and rare animals and vegetables, geological heritages at regional and international levels. This is really an attractive destination of scientists and tourists.

Besides the beautiful scenery, you also experience and explore the lives of ethnic minorities in the Plateau of Rock.



Highlights 

- Beautiful country road 
- Picturesque scenery 
- Dong Van ancient market 
- Ma Pi Leng Pass (the Happy Street) 
- Trinh Tuong’s House 
- Vuong Meo Family’s house 
- Dong Van Market
